name: vigilante-scraper
description: After getting a bike stolen, you begin having delusions about the thief being foolish enough to place your item online for sale on websites like Kijiji, Facebook Marketplace, and other vendors. You begin to check these websites daily for any signs of your lost item but no luck. This begins to get tedious. You stop being as vigilant... and that's when the thief makes their move! You have lost...
